text: Macedonian denar is the currency of North Macedonia. The first denar was introduced on April 26, 1992.20 years of the Macedonian denar will be celebrated NovaMakedonija It replaced the Yugoslav dinar. In May 1993, the currency was reformed. A new denar was introduced with one new denar being equal to 100 old denars. == References == Category:Currency of Europe Category:North Macedonia
title: Macedonian denar
